== Poinguinim (627026) ==
      
Poinguinim is a village in the [[Canacona]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 3546.4 hectares and harbouring 1574 households with total population of 6625 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[CANACONA]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 3226 and female population is 3399. Scheduled Caste Population is 20 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1197. Census Location Code of the village is 627026<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 5299
* Literate male population: 2714 (84.13%)
* Literate female population: 2585 (76.05%)
